What is the outlook for Moebius Syndrome ?,"There is no cure for Moebius syndrome. In spite of the impairments that characterize the disorder, proper care and treatment give many individuals a normal life expectancy.",NINDS,Moebius Syndrome
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Moebius Syndrome ?,"The NINDS conducts and supports a broad range of research on neurogenetic disor
